These patches add two new dependencies: i) eu.geclipse.voms -> eu.geclipse.info ii) GriaVirtualOrganization -> eu.geclipse.info

Hi Nikos,
patches applied and commited.
Marking as resolved now that patches are committed.
Don't think there is much to check, just closing it.

Hmm, I just found this bug here and I am wondering what it fixes or what new functionality is included here???
Could you please describe what's included in those magic patches?

The glue info view is moved into the eu.geclipse.info plugin. Glueinfo view is now middleware independent as it can display glue(glite) or/and gria information. The gria information system is not actually implemented though yet. Information systems are implemented now as eclipse extensions.
